languages.text: "Когда ты завершишь свой труд, я бы хотел взглянуть на него. Быть может, твои открытия заставят и мое сознание стряхнуть пепел ложной веры и откроют новые горизонты".
"I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."
languages.original_text: "Когда ты завершишь свой труд, я бы хотел взглянуть на него. Быть может, твои открытия заставят и мое сознание стряхнуть пепел ложной веры и откроют новые горизонты".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labor is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."
"I would like to take a look once your great labor is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."
"I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."
"I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."
"I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

languages.text: “等你完成你的伟大造物之后，我也想看看。或许你的发现能帮助我抖落思想中虚伪信仰的灰烬，让我得到新的启示。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: “等你完成你的伟大造物之后，我也想看看。或许你的发现能帮助我抖落思想中虚伪信仰的灰烬，让我得到新的启示。”

languages.text: «Cuando termines tu gran labor, me gustaría echarle un vistazo. Tal vez tus descubrimientos permitan a mi mente deshacerse de las cenizas de la falsa fe y revelar nuevos horizontes».
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando termines tu gran labor, me gustaría echarle un vistazo. Tal vez tus descubrimientos permitan a mi mente deshacerse de las cenizas de la falsa fe y revelar nuevos horizontes».

languages.text: 「その大仕事が終わったらぜひお目にかかりたい。お前の見つけたものは、この偽りの信仰心という埃を払い落として、新たな道の先を見せてくれると思うんだ」
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: 「その大仕事が終わったらぜひお目にかかりたい。お前の見つけたものは、この偽りの信仰心という埃を払い落として、新たな道の先を見せてくれると思うんだ」

languages.text: "Ich würde gerne einen Blick auf Euer großes Werk werfen, wenn es abgeschlossen ist. Vielleicht kann mein Geist durch Eure Entdeckungen die Asche des falschen Glaubens abschütteln und neue Horizonte erblicken."
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde gerne einen Blick auf Euer großes Werk werfen, wenn es abgeschlossen ist. Vielleicht kann mein Geist durch Eure Entdeckungen die Asche des falschen Glaubens abschütteln und neue Horizonte erblicken."

languages.text: « J'espère que vous permettrez de voir le résultat de votre travail une fois que vous l'aurez terminé. Vos découvertes me permettront peut-être de libérer mon esprit des réminiscences de la foi mensongère et d'étendre mon horizon. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous permettrez de voir le résultat de votre travail une fois que vous l'aurez terminé. Vos découvertes me permettront peut-être de libérer mon esprit des réminiscences de la foi mensongère et d'étendre mon horizon. »

languages.text: "Çaban meyvesini verdiğinde sonuçlarını görmek isterim kardeşim. Kim bilir... Belki de keşiflerin sayesinde sahte inancımın küllerinden doğup yeni ufuklara yelken açarım."
languages.original_text: "I would like to take a look once your great labour is complete. Perhaps your discoveries will let my mind shake off the ashes of the false faith and reveal new horizons."

traits.locale_text: "Çaban meyvesini verdiğinde sonuçlarını görmek isterim kardeşim. Kim bilir? Belki de keşiflerin sayesinde sahte inancımın küllerinden doğup yeni ufuklara yelken açarım…"
